name: 6 Pcs Embroidery Hoop 6 Size, Round Plastic Cross Stitch Hoop with 16 Needles (3.6In to 10.7 in), Small Embroidery Hoop, Cross Stitch Hoops and Frames, Suitable for Embroidery, Craft Sewing
short_description: Multiple sizes: our embroidery hoop, each set has 6 different sizes of embroidery hoops and a bag of needles (16 pieces/bag); The size (diameter) of the embroidery hoop: 9.2 cm (about 3.6 in), 12.3 cm (about 4.8 in), 16 cm (about 6.3 in), 20 cm (about 7.9 in), 24.2 cm (about 9.5 in), and 27.1 cm (about 10.7 in). High-quality plastic material: Our cross stitch hoop is made of high-quality plastic. It's durable, lightweight, non-fading, and the smooth surface won't snag fabric. Humanized treatment: our embroidery hoop opening will be wider, and the upgraded adjustable screw can easily tighten the fabric and knitting so that the knit is firmly fixed in the small embroidery hoop. A variety of ways to use: Cross stitch hoops and frames in a variety of sizes are available, suitable for embroidery, cross-stitch, sewing, sewing, and a variety of embroidery items, providing tension. Is a great gift for embroidery learners, beginners, friends, colleagues, and DIY enthusiasts. Tips: If you have any quality problems with the products you have received, please contact us, and we will try our best to solve the problem for you within 24 hours.

name: Moni Crafts Embroidery Kit for Beginners – DIY Hand Embroidery Set for Adults and Kids with 4 Stamped Patterns, Hoop, Threads, Needles and Step-by-Step Stitch Guide to Learn 33 Stitches
short_description: 🧵 Complete embroidery kit for beginners – Moni Crafts beginner embroidery kit includes everything you need to start stitching with confidence: 4 pre-printed 12"x12" cotton cloths, 7.8" bamboo hoop, 12 vibrant embroidery threads, 5 metallic threads, 12 gold self-threading needles, 9 embroidery needles, scissors, needle threader, seam ripper, and our exclusive 24-page beginner guidebook. 🧵 Learn embroidery the easy way – Our 24-page “Ultimate Guide to Embroidery” walks you through 33 beginner-friendly stitches with clear illustrations. Designed for absolute beginners, kids (ages 8+), teens, and adults to master embroidery step by step—no experience needed! 🧵 A creative, thoughtful gift idea – Beautifully packaged and ready to gift, this embroidery kit is perfect for birthdays, Christmas, Mother’s Day, or anyone starting a mindful new hobby. A charming DIY gift for women, girls, and crafty adults. 🧵 Premium quality, made to last – Made with 100% natural bamboo hoop, soft durable cotton cloth, long-lasting colorful and metallic threads, and gold-plated needles for smooth stitching. Quality materials for frustration-free crafting. 🧵 Supportive & stress-free crafting experience – We care about your journey. From thoughtful design to step-by-step support, Moni Crafts is here to make embroidery relaxing, joyful, and rewarding. Questions? Our friendly customer care team is happy to help!

name: Dimensions 72-70368 Circular Embroidery Sampler Kit for Beginners, 6" Diameter Hoop, Multicolor, 5 Pieces
short_description: This embroidery set for beginners contains presorted thread, printed fabric, 6-inch bamboo hoop, needle, and instructions Completed embroidery pattern measures 6" in diameter and is designed to fit inside the included hoop Our colorful sampler teaches many types of embroidery stitches from simple back and running stitch to buttonhole, stem, chain, woven rose, and more Dimensions embroidery kits include an easy-to-follow chart and key as well as detailed stitch diagrams, plus the package features a large color image of the finished embroidery design for reference as you stitch Perfect as an starter embroidery kit for beginners, this set is great for children or adults looking to learn a craft
product_description: Create a multicolor sampler using an array of embroidery stitches with this beautifully designed beginner's embroidery kit from Dimensions! Each "ring" is worked in a different stitch, so you'll feel like an embroidery pro after completing this project! Plus, all Dimensions needlepoint kits include an easy-to-follow chart and key as well as detailed stitch diagrams, plus the package features a large color image of the finished embroidery design for reference as you stitch to make learning needle crafts fun and easy. Makes a great accent for your home or office. Finish in the included 6-inch bamboo hoop or mount in a purchased frame once you've completed the pattern! This embroidery needlepoint kit for beginners contains presorted thread, printed fabric, 6-inch bamboo hoop, needle, and instructions.

name: Caydo Embroidery Kit with Water Soluble Embroidery Stabilizer Including 2Pcs Embroidery Hoops, 100 Color Threads, Embroidery Fabric, and Cross Stitch Tool Embroidery Starter Kits for Adults Beginners
short_description: Water Soluble Embroidery Stabilizer: The kit includes 2pcs self-adhesive water soluble embroidery stabilizer which can be printed on and easily adheres to various surfaces, making it suitable for holding small areas such as pockets, cuffs, and collars Practice Fabric: This kit provides one pre-printed fabric featuring 15 basic stitch patterns and blank embroidery practice fabric, convenient for beginners to learn and practice embroidery Complete Embroidery Kit: Includes 1 pcs pre-printed embroidery fabric with 15 basic stitch patterns and 1 blank embroidery practice fabric, 2 pcs water-solubleembroidery stabilizer, 2 embroidery hoops (6 inches and 8 inches), 100 vibrant colored threads, 1 set of embroidery needles, 4 needle threaders, 1 seam ripper, 1 scissors, 12 thread spools, 1 thimble, and a detailed instruction，allowing beginners to dive into the joy of embroidery from the very first stitch Easy operation: Embroidery hoops have a brass adjustment screw so that you can tighten when necessary to keep the fabric as tight as a drum Precious Gift: Enjoying the DIY embroidery process, completing the work with love and give it as a gift to your family or friend, that will be a meaningful experience

short_description: Package contents: 3 white pre-printed butterfly embroidery fabrics, 3 plastic embroidery hoops, 3 embroidery threads, 3 user guides, and 6 needles. This set provides everything you need to get started with butterfly embroidery. Pre-printed patterns: The fabric comes with pre-printed butterfly patterns, making it easy to get started without worrying about drawing the design. Durable materials: The plastic hoops are sturdy and won't damage the fabric, while the embroidery threads are made of high-quality materials that won't easily break or fray. Versatile use: The embroidery fabrics can be used for a variety of projects, such as tablecloths, pillowcases, and decorative wall hangings. Ideal for beginners: This kit is perfect for beginners who want to try embroidery for the first time or for experienced crafters who want to enjoy the relaxing and rewarding experience of butterfly embroidery.
product_description: Product Introduction: The 3 Set Butterfly Embroidery Material Pack is perfect for those who love the art of embroidery. This pack includes everything you need to create 3 butterfly embroidery designs. The package contains 3 pieces of white pre-printed butterfly embroidery fabric, 3 plastic embroidery hoops, 3 embroidery threads, 3 usage guides, and 6 needles. The pre-printed pattern on the fabric makes it easier for beginners to start their embroidery project! It's perfect for personal use or as a gift for embroidery enthusiasts.

name: Bradove Beginner Embroidery Kit for Adults Kids, Learn to Embroider 37 Stitches and 13 Cute Patterns, Stitches Kit, Bead Embroidery Kit, Beginner Embroidery Practice
short_description: 【Slow Living: Achieve Inner Peace with Bradove】You are always being told to do more, to go faster, to be better, but it's time for you to slow down and practice self-care. Your Bradove Embroidery Kit can help you do that. Every time you use Bradove, it allows you to put aside worries, find your own little space of tranquility, and immerse yourself in every stitch and thread. Choose Bradove and make slow living a part of your life, finding peace and joy in every stitch. 【Guaranteed you'll learn how to embroider】Do you know why the embroidery kits on the market fail to solve the problem of "difficult to learn for beginners"? Because most of them "don't have good teaching videos or haven't taught from scratch." Our exclusively designed embroidery kits include easy-to-follow video tutorials that teach you from the basics: how to separate floss, how to tie knots, how to end stitches, and more. And teach you in detail how to complete each pattern. It can effectively solve the problem of "difficult to learn for beginners". You'll learn how to embroider, if not, we have a money-back guarantee in 30days. 【Passed REACH chemical substance test】This product has passed the 2023 No.722 REACH (Registration, Evaluation, Authorization and Restriction of Chemicals) test. This product is guaranteed to contain no substances that posing to human health or the environmental hazards 【Has All That You Need】Our embroidery starter kit includes everything you need to kickstart your embroidery journey. From high-quality threads to premium fabric, needles, scissor, threader, seam ripper, and embroidery hoop 【The Perfect Gift for Yourself and Loved Ones】The embroidery kit allows you to embrace the beauty of slow living, enjoy moments of solitude, and make meaningful use of your free time. Whether you're a busy professional, a student in need of relaxation, or a curious child, it offers significant benefits. For children, embroidery is a fantastic way to enhance hand-eye coordination. Why not make embroidery a delightful part of your life or a shared activity with someone special? For families, it’s an excellent way to bond and grow together. In a fast-paced world, the simple act of stitching can help you find moments of tranquility, joy, and connection.

name: ZXIIXZ 72 Pcs Cross Stitch Supplies, Embroidery Kit for Beginners with Cross Stitch Hoops Needles Embroidery Scissors Floss Bobbins Seam Ripper for Adults, Embroidery Tools DIY Supplies
short_description: Cross Stitch Beginners Kits: Includes 6 pcs cross stitch hoops, 1 pcs vintage scissors, 1 pcs large seam ripper, 12 pcs bobbins, 45 pcs embroidery needles, 3 pcs thimbles, 3 pcs needle threaders, and 1 pcs measuring tape. Basic cross stitch tool kit, multiple cross-stitch hoop sizes to meet your daily use needs 6 Sizes Cross Stitch Hoops: 6 Different embroidery hoop sizes, including 10cm/3.94in, 13cm/5.12in, 18cm/7.09in, 20cm/7.87in, 23cm/9.06in, 26cm/10.24in. The small size embroidery hoop is suitable for small embroidery projects, and the large size embroidery hoop is suitable for larger embroidery projects. Each embroidery hoop comes with an adjustable tightening screw, which can be directly screwed in when you determine the position to fix the embroidered fabric for easy embroidery 45 Pcs Cross Stitch Needles: There are 3 different sizes of embroidery needles, 3.4cm/1.38in, 3.8cm/1.5in, 4cm/1.57in, 15 pcs needles of each size, and a needle bottle. A variety of sizes and sufficient quantity to meet your daily embroidery needs, you can put them into the needle bottle after use, convenient for next use. The seam ripper is convenient for removing excess embroidery thread. The large size is more convenient to hold and use, and the seam removal is faster Embroidery Scissors: The embroidery starter kit also includes a pair of crane-shaped scissors. The long pointed part on the top of the scissors is more suitable for embroidery crafts. It can reach the fabric position that needs to be adjusted without touching other positions, making it more convenient to use Easy to Use and Wide Application: The cross stitch kit includes basic embroidery tools supplies, which can complete embroidery projects more effectively. It is suitable for cross stitch, daily embroidery, pillows, clothing, curtains, backpacks, wallets, tablecloths and other DIY embroidery crafts
product_description: The set includes 72pcs embroidery tools, including 12 bobbins, which are convenient for you to store the embroidery floss you need when embroidering. You can use multiple bobbins according to different colors. There are 3 threaders, which are convenient for using embroidery needles. If you need to measure the size of the fabric when embroidering, the tape measure can help you measure the length accurately. Various detailed tools can help you be more efficient throughout the embroidery project and the embroidery effect will be better.

BEGINNER-FRIENDLY: With clear illustrated guides, extra high-definition video tutorials, basic embroidery stitches, and a variety of floral motifs, you’ll level up your skills whether you’re starting or seeking a rewarding next step in embroidery. UNIQUE FLORAL DESIGNS: Each flower pattern brings a fresh style and vibrant energy, perfect for displaying in your home or giving as personalized handmade gifts. Express your creativity through exclusive designs while enjoying the calming art of stitching. FLEXIBLE CRAFTING: 2 sturdy hoops, providing flexibility for simultaneous projects, shared crafting with a friend, or working . Keep each piece taut and your progress organized as you rotate between beautiful motifs. GIFT BOX & IDEAL FOR GROUP ACTIVITY: Comes in an elegant rigid box, making it an impressive gift for friends, creative loved ones, or hobby groups. Perfect for birthdays, Mother's Day, or festive celebrations—encourage creativity and relaxation for all craft enthusiasts.
